mapper.insert: INSERT INTO instagram_post (post_id, user_id, content, post_date, status) VALUES (#{post_id}, #{user_id}, #{content}, CONVERT_TZ(NOW(), 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul'), 'Y');
INSERT INTO instagram_post_image (image_id, post_id, image_url) VALUES (#{image_id}, #{post_id}, #{image_url});
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.post_date, p.content, u.user_name, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM instagram_post_like l WHERE l.post_id = p.post_id) AS likeCount FROM instagram_post p JOIN instagram_user u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.status = 'Y' ORDER BY p.post_date DESC LIMIT 4 OFFSET #{offset};
